properties.description:
Main ETL Load and its getting metadata
and calling each pipeline..

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DEPTSRC
EMPSRC, DEPTSRC join(EMPSRC@DEPTNO == DEPTSRC@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> INNERJOIN
INNERJOIN select(mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO = EMPSRC@DEPTNO,
		Deptno = DEPTSRC@Deptno,
		Dname,
		Loc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SELECTFEWFIELDS
SELECTFEWFIELDS aggregate(groupBy(Dname),
	SUM_OF_SAL = sum(toInteger(SAL)+iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emp_aggregate_csv.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSEMPSRC
DSEMPSRC aggregate(groupBy(DEPTNO),
	TOTAL_SAL_BY_DEPT = sum(toInteger(SAL) + iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['aggregate_data.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(TOTAL_SAL = toInteger(SAL) + iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_NUMBER = EMPNO,
		FULL_NAME = ENAME,
		JOB,
		SALARAY = SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO,
		TOTAL_SAL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(EMPKEY as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['derivedcolumn.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TARGETFILE

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DEPTSRC
EMPSRC, DEPTSRC join(EMPSRC@DEPTNO == DEPTSRC@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(TOTAL_SAL = toInteger(SAL) +iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO = EMPSRC@DEPTNO,
		Deptno = DEPTSRC@Deptno,
		Dname,
		Loc,
		TOTAL_SAL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(JOB),
	SUM_OF_SAL = sum(TOTAL_SAL)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['JOB_WISE_SAL'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
EMPSRC pivot(groupBy(JOB),
	pivotBy(DEPTNO),
	SUM_SAL_BY_DEPTNO = sum(toInteger(SAL)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['pivot.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMMPSRC
EMMPSRC rank(desc(toInteger(SAL), true),
	output(SAL_RANK as long)) ~> Rank1
Rank1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rank.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
EMPSRC sort(asc(ENAME, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 keyGenerate(output(EMP_KEY as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SORT_With_Surrogate_key'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCEMPADLS
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCDEPTADLS
SRCEMPADLS, SRCDEPTADLS join(SRCEMPADLS@DEPTNO == SRCDEPTADLS@Deptno,
	joinType:'outer',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(SRCEMPADLS@DEPTNO=='30') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(asc(ENAME, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empdatafile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EMPTARGETBLOB

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCEMP
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCDEPT
SRCEMP, SRCDEPT exists(SRCEMP@DEPTNO == SRCDEPT@Deptno,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['exist_emp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TARGETEMP

source(output(
		name as string,
		location as string,
		satellites as string[],
		goods as (trade as boolean, customers as string[], orders as (orderId as string, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as string)[]))[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> JSONDS
JSONDS foldDown(unroll(satellites),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		goods
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> satellites
satellites foldDown(unroll(goods.customers),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		trade = goods.trade,
		customers = goods.customers,
		orders = goods.orders
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Customers
Customers foldDown(unroll(orders),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		trade,
		customers,
		orders
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> orders
orders foldDown(unroll(orders.shipped.orderItems),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		trade,
		customers,
		orderId = orders.orderId,
		orderTotal = orders.orderTotal,
		itemName = orders.shipped.orderItems.itemName,
		itemQty = orders.shipped.orderItems.itemQty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> shipped
shipped sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['jsonflattern.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> jsonflattern

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCEMP
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCDEPT
SRCEMP, SRCDEPT lookup(SRCEMP@DEPTNO == SRCDEPT@Deptno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(SRCDEPT@Deptno, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['lookupempfile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMPSRC
EMPSRC keyGenerate(output(EMP_KEY as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emp_surrogate_key'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCEMP
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRC2EMP
SRCEMP, SRC2EMP union(byName: false)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['uniondata.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UNIONTARGET

source(output(
		order_number as string,
		customer as string,
		apple as string,
		banana as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSSRCUNPIVOT
DSSRCUNPIVOT unpivot(output(
		product as string,
		qty as string
	),
	ungroupBy(order_number,
		customer),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unpivot_data.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> unpivotingdata
